data.name: James M.
data.quote: Seeing the direct updates from the field makes me feel truly connected. Knowing exactly where my donation goes is why I've supported this NGO for 3 years.

data.name: Sarah L.
data.quote: The new school supplies completely transformed our village. Girls can attend school regularly now. Thank you.

data.name: John Doe
data.quote: The support I received from Educate a Rural Girl changed my life completely. They didn't just give me food; they gave me the tools to build a future for my family.

data.name: Elena Martinez
data.quote: I donate to Educate a Rural Girl because I can see exactly where my money goes. Their transparency and direct impact on the ground are unmatched.
